name: HexHexHoneybee
description:
A rather simple "Flappy Bird" clone I created to make myself familiar with Stencyl, showcased here primarily for the design.

Art, programming: Nina Kiel

Music: "Windy Bluffs" by Visager (taken from the album "Songs from an Unmade World") - Please consider supporting this awesome artist, who made all of the songs from this album available for free so that game developers can use them.

Font: "Huxley Titling" by Gary David Bouton
